function.name: GetLitestepWnd
function.description: Returns a handle to LiteStep's main window.

return.description: If the function is successful, the return value is a handle to LiteStep's main window. If an error occurs, the return value is NULL.

remarks.p: To access some shell functions, a module must send a message to LiteStep's main window. Call GetLitestepWnd to get a handle to that window.
